name: Arabian Princess in the Night of the Great Royal Kingdom Palace Escape - Free Kids Game
name_original: Arabian Princess in the Night of the Great Royal Kingdom Palace Escape - Free Kids Game
description:
Escape the Palace and fly away on a magic carpet, confuse the hapless chasing guards with power from the genie lamp and find your adventure in this charming game, for girls everywhere.

As an Arabian Princess, stuck in a dull Palace with nothing to do but smile and be pretty is so boring! But wait, isan't that a real Genie who's come to stay? Your chance for adventure is here! Borrowing his magic carpet and lamp you fly off into the night, the guards will soon give chase but you have the power of the lamp to hold them at bay.

Winging above the city in the evening sky is so much more exciting! Swoop and collect all the sparkling jewels and your Princess friends will fly a carpet of their own too. Gather genie lamps, carpets and even a snake charmer basket for more magical powers to confuse those guards with and stay in the sky just a little longer.

What do you say Princess? Ready for magical adventure?


Features:

- Travel epic Arabian skies
- Game Center Leaderboards
- 4 Princess friends
- One Touch Game Play
- Loads of Power Ups
- Charming girls adventure
